data.system_settings: Motorola X Pure running an unofficial lineage OS 14.0 (7.1.2)
data.actual_result: If you're attempting to edit a users roles on the 'Members' section located in 'Server Settings', you can see the roles.
data.expected_result: Usually, role management would only appear if you have the correct permissions.
data.short_description: Even without the perms, you can see the roles if you click on 'Members' and attempt to edit a user.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord - Go onto a dedicated server where you don't have the 'Manage Roles' permission enabled, make sure you're not the creator - Click on 'Server Settings' - Click on 'Members' - Tap on a user
